title: Trainer
description:
**Cloud Computing Trainer :**

**At Natsav Academy, we take immense pride in offering a wide array of IT and professional certification courses, ensuring that our learners have access to a comprehensive selection of learning opportunities.**

**Responsibilities**:

Cloud Computing Trainer is responsible for educating individuals or groups on the principles, practices, and technologies associated with cloud computing. Their responsibilities typically include:

1. Curriculum Development: Designing and developing training materials, including presentations, exercises, and hands-on labs, that cover various aspects of cloud computing.

2. Training Delivery: Conducting training sessions, workshops, or seminars for individuals or groups, either in-person or online, to teach them about cloud computing concepts, platforms, and services.

3. Content Creation: Creating educational content such as articles, blog posts, videos, or tutorials to supplement training materials and provide additional resources for learners.

4. Technical Support: Providing technical support and guidance to learners during training sessions, helping them troubleshoot issues, and answering questions related to cloud computing.

5. Evaluation and Feedback: Assessing the effectiveness of training programs through evaluations, surveys, or quizzes, and providing feedback to learners to help them improve their understanding of cloud computing.

6. Stay Updated: Keeping up-to-date with the latest developments and trends in cloud computing, including new technologies, services, and best practices, to ensure training materials are current and relevant.

7. Collaboration: Collaborating with other trainers, subject matter experts, and stakeholders to ensure training programs meet the needs of learners and align with organizational goals.

8. Certification: Preparing learners for cloud computing certification exams, such as those offered by AWS, Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud, by covering relevant topics and providing exam preparation resources.

9. Continuous Improvement: Continuously improving training materials and delivery methods based on feedback from learners and changes in the cloud computing landscape.

10. Mentorship: Providing mentorship and guidance to learners who are interested in pursuing a career in cloud computing, helping them develop the necessary skills and knowledge.

Overall, a Cloud Computing Trainer plays a crucial role in helping individuals and organizations understand and leverage cloud computing technologies to improve efficiency, scalability, and innovation.

**Requirements:**

1. To become a cloud computing trainer, you'll need a strong understanding of cloud computing concepts and technologies. This typically includes knowledge of major cloud platforms such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.

2. You should also have experience working with cloud services such as virtual machines, databases, networking, and security in a cloud environment. Teaching experience or the ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts is important as well.

3. Consider obtaining relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect, or Google Professional Cloud Architect to demonstrate your expertise in cloud computing.

4. Lastly, staying current with industry trends and continuously updating your skills will help you excel as a cloud computing trainer. Good luck on your journey to becoming a skilled and knowledgeable cloud computing educator!

**Classes on a regular basis Monday to Saturday**

description:
**Senior Applications Technical Specialist** **-** **MUM01IV****Company****:** Worley**Primary Location****:** IND-MM-Mumbai**Other Locations****:** IND-KR-Bangalore, IND-MM-Pune, IND-TN-Chennai, IND-GJ-Vadodara, IND-MM-Navi Mumbai, IND-AP-Hyderabad, IND-WB-Kolkata**Job****:** Applications**Schedule****:** Full-time**Employment Type****:** Employee**Job Level****:** Experienced**Job Posting****:** Feb 26, 2024**Unposting Date****:** Mar 27, 2024**Reporting Manager Title****:** Senior Manager
: ***51,000 people. 49 countries. Over 120 office locations.***  

*We’re not just engineers. We’re a global team of data scientists, consultants, construction workers and innovators all working to create a better tomorrow. Every day, we help customers in energy, chemicals and resources get one step closer to solving our planet’s toughest issues. Climate change. The energy transition. Digital transformation. And how we can deliver a more sustainable world.?*


*Whatever your ambition, there’s a path for you here. And there’s no barrier to your potential career success. For more information, visit* *Worley.com*



What - How - Why

  


Project Implementation


* Participate in project discussions, investigate and understand project requirements, and take the lead with the development and adherence to the Project Information Management Plan. Revise the plan as needed when changes occur that affect the use of Smart 3D/3Dx and related activities.


* Set up and configure projects and users in Smart 3D/3Dx and related systems.


* Deliver presentations to the project team as required.


* Develop training schedules and deliver required training.


* Maintain a strong working relationship and rapport with projects to ensure objectives are being met and solutions applied are effective.
  


Project and User Support


* Provide Smart 3D/3Dx system support to projects and users at 2nd and 3rd tier levels using Service Now.


* Proactively seek out ways to help projects and users to maximize efficiency using Smart 3D/3Dx.


* Monitor the use of Smart 3D/3Dx to ensure compliance with global standards and that each function’s activities support the next, and ultimately support the required and effective use of Smart 3D/3Dx at all project locations (including site offices).


* Perform system health checks throughout the project lifecycle and close out projects with lessons learned.


* Practical knowledge of Smart API’s, .NET, C# programming language, Automation and SQL
  


Training


* Provide training to users online with global standards and project requirements.


* Assist with the development and maintenance of training documentation.
  


New Release Testing and Implementation


* Test all modules/functions used in the global standard configuration.


* Ensure projects will not be negatively impacted by the upgrade.


* Report issues to vendor for resolution as needed – expedite solutions.


* Plan and support production rollout.


* Communicate changes to the users.


* Monitor success post rollout – manage issues.
  


Systems Knowledge and Continuous Improvement


* Maintain in-depth knowledge of Smart 3D/3Dx System in all modules and associated work processes.
* Maintain a high level of understanding of functional work processes and procedures, overall EPC business, and project execution.


* Investigate ways to improve productivity, efficiency, or information availability and visibility for projects.


* Evaluate new system functionality and determine if fit for purpose.
  


Collaboration with the Business


* Regular meetings with the Locations Functional representatives for Smart 3D/3Dx in the specific region


* Coordinate in-house education, promotion and awareness programs for project staff and business unit managers


* Input to proposals and presentations with respect to our integrated execution capabilities at Worley.
  


Develop Location Support Team Capability


* Develop location support team capabilities for Smart 3D/3Dx and implementation, training (train the trainer), and 2nd tier support (where location support teams are available, the global team is 3rd tier support for advanced issues).


* Communicate regularly with location support teams regarding changes in System that may impact projects and users, and to understand the status of project implementation and usage effectiveness.
  


Responsible for personal safety, safe working practices etc. Understand and follow the Worley Life - safety and well-being approach.

  


Support Project Information Manager in planning and coordination of Project Delivery Systems configuration, implementation, integration and training during start-up of new projects as they apply to Smart 3D/3Dx systems.



  

  

Job Specific Knowledge:


* 10+ years’ experience with Smart 3D/3Dx systems usage, support, administration, configuration, automation and integration.


* Comprehensive understanding of Smart 3D/3Dx principles.


* Strong overall understanding of project requirements, deliverables and workflows.


* Ability to effectively deliver presentations to both internal and external stakeholders.



Industry Specific Experience:


* 10+ years of relevant mechanical and piping engineering experience; preferably using Smart 3D/3Dx or equivalent.



Education – Qualifications, Accreditation, Training:


* A recognised degree or equivalent qualification/experience.

HSE Capability:


* Demonstrate behaviour and business practices commensurate with a culture of world’s best health, safety, and environmental performance.

IT Skills:


* Proficient in MS Office applications.


* General knowledge of systems (operating systems, software installation, and configurations).



People Skills:


* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, strong organizational skills, detail oriented, self-motivated, and efficient.


* Ability to apply intelligence and knowledge to problem solving and meet deadlines.


* Be able to coordinate work with other offices.


* Be a team player and able to work effectively in a virtual team.


* Be service oriented.


* Be proactive – not reactive.

Other:


* Responsible for working within the provisions and guidelines of the Worley Quality Assurance system
  

  

***What we offer you***

*Providing an agile culture and challenging work opportunities results in a positive work environment. Our people enjoy competitive compensation packages and a fun, personal, collaborative and safe working environment. We value equal employment opportunity and are committed to promoting fairness, equality and diversity.*

  

*Our policy is to conduct background checks for all candidates who accept an offer of employment with us.*


***If you have the passion and talent to keep up, it's time to test the limits of what you can become. Find your future with Worley.***

title: Technical Trainer
description:
**Location: Mumbai, Maharashtra, India**  

**Job ID:** 73850

  

**We Elevate... You**
=====================


Join Schindler and help us elevate our world: Use your skills to allow megacities to grow. With our elevators and escalators, we keep the urban world moving.  



Since 1874 Schindler has been a Citymaker with proud reputation for elevating not only buildings, but the well-being of everyone who lives and works in them. People, passion, and innovation are the pillars of our success.

  

Established in 1998, Schindler India is a wholly owned subsidiary of Schindler Holding Co. We supply elevators, escalators and mobility technology for all market segments: residential apartment blocks, business and shopping centers, high-rise towers as well as transport infrastructure such as metro stations and airport terminals. With sales growth double that of the industry, a rapidly burgeoning portfolio and expanding employee base each year, Schindler India is poised for a leadership position in India in the short term.

  


**Join us as a**


**Technical Trainer - Schindler University**
============================================

  

#### **We Elevate... Your Responsibilities**

The Technical Trainer creates added value through the preparation, planning and execution of technical training courses according to the KG technical training plan.

  


Key responsibilities include:

  


* Train employees according to the courses assigned in the technical training plan.
* Develop new technical training courses as requested by the KG business needs.
* Adapt Corporate technical training courses to local needs.
* Support the Technical Certification program.
* Maintain and update the training management systems.

  




Education : Must be Degree/Diploma in Electrical/Electronics/Electro-Mechanical


Location : Mumbai (Powai)

Expertise

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------


**Job Title:**
Customer Service Trainer
**Location:**
Hyderabad, India
**Schedule:**
Full-Time, Permanent
**Team:**
Customer Service
**Department:**
Operations
**What's your new role about?**
-------------------------------


Welcome to DAZN, the world’s leading live OTT sports service. Disrupting an industry isn’t easy! DAZN is playing more hours of live sport than any other company anywhere in the world! As we bring new ideas to market and evolve our product, it’s essential that we execute to a high standard in Customer Services and evolve our model in service to looking after our fans.

You will have experience of creating training content and programs to ensure agent readiness. This includes the design and delivery of product and soft skills training, aligned with best practices of instructional design and learning theories. You will play a key role working across markets and driving a global standard of training.

This role will be based in our brand new Hyderabad office. Join us in India’s beautiful “City of Pearls” and bring your ambition to life. Benefits will include access to DAZN, an annual performance related bonus, family friendly community, free access for you and one other to our workplace mental health platform app (Unmind), learning and development resources and access to our internal speaker series and events.
### **As our new Customer Service Trainer & Quality Analyst you'll have the opportunity to:**


* Define our success metrics within Training
* Build a training plan and deliver it
* Work on strategic projects and ensure business readiness
* Work with CS Operations to ensure agent readiness
* Work across markets and regions globally
* Support improving our global KPI’s

### **You’ll be set up for success if you have:**

* Customer service background
* Zendesk Knowledge
* Training design experience
* Training delivery experience (virtual/classroom/blended)
* Quality assurance experience in a customer service environment
* Worked with different countries and understand how local market nuances impact quality
* Experience working in a digital world, with digital contact channels
* Good planning and execution skills
* An analytical, inquisitive and problem solving approach
* Excellent stakeholder management
* Clear and concise communication
* A keen interest in sports

### **Here's a little more about us…**


At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be.  

As part of our team,you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.
**DAZN VALUES – THE ‘HOW’ IN WHAT WE DO:**
**AMBITIOUS – people who want to make a big impact and drive DAZN forward.**
**INVENTIVE – people with bright ideas who deliver great new experiences for our customers – and improvements for our business. People who come up with better, simpler ways of doing things.**
**PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, our content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.**
**BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results.**
**SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions.**  

At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities.  

Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone.

If you’d like to include a cover letter with your application, please feel free to. Please do not feel you need to apply with a photo or disclose any other information that is not related to your professional experience.

Our aim is to make our hiring processes as accessible for everyone as possible, including providing adjustments for interviews where we can.

We look forward to hearing from you.

title: IT Support
description:
**Position Description:**

This position supports the review, analysis and interpretation of electrical schematics and specifications for critical facilities. The Electrical Schematic Engineer will support the ingestion of Client Schematics and electrical one-line drawings, implementation of electrical infrastructure into a digital twin, and quality control to validate accuracy of the digital twin. The Electrical Schematic Engineer is to support the planning and execution of implementing a digital twin for the electrical infrastructure of the mission critical facility. They will be expected to execute against the project schedule through the coordination of internal team members to complete the desired electrical twin implementation.

Electrical Schematic Engineer will be exposed to cutting edge technologies in the Hyperscale and other spaces. You will have an opportunity to work with recognized subject matter experts allowing YOU to be a key player in bringing data technologies to market. As part of our company culture, we invest in YOUR future, and commit to hands on certifications as well as professional training. Our collaborative culture ensures that our customers benefit from exemplary work across our entire range of professional services.
**Responsibilities:**

Support all aspects of ingestion and interpretation of client schematics / electrical one-line drawings.
Support complete implementation of the electrical infrastructure systems into a digital twin QA/QC of all digital twin datasets.
Become a **subject matter expert** in the digital twin technology, complete requisite training and onboarding activities.
Perform beta testing and validation of software updates to the digital twin technology, provide written reports and analysis on new features, provide input on training and onboarding materials as needed when updates are released.
Provide input, insight and feedback on the efficacy and ease-of-use for the digital twin technology.
Provide input and insight to the overall implementation plan.
Develop reports for the implementation team.
Attend and be an active participant of regular stakeholder meetings for the implementation projects.
QA/QC of digital twin accuracy.
Provide documentation that that the digital twin is evaluated, validated and aligns with schematics and electrical one-line drawings.
Duties may be increased as experience and skill allow.  

**Requirements include:**

Position Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience
15 + years management experience in the IT sector
The ideal candidate should possess experience in the role, having served as a trainer, player, or coach.
5 + years’ experience leading and building a technology and support organization.
Should be deadline driven.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
Customer service DNA
Technical expertise in engineering drawings
Knowledge of data center design concepts.
Knowledge and experience with Electrical Distribution Switchgear, Substations, Uninterruptable Power Supplies (UPS), Automatic Transfer Switches (ATS), Batteries, Emergency Diesel Generators & Load Banks.
Knowledge of Lockout Tagout procedures and best practices
Strong experience with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
Ability to effectively write daily reports.
**Other Requirements:**
Has the capability to support multiple time zones for a global organization and client base.
**About CAI**

CAI is a 100% employee-owned company established in 1996 that has grown to more than 800 people worldwide. We provide commissioning, qualification, validation, start-up, project management and other consulting services associated with operational readiness to FDA regulated and other mission-critical industries.**Meeting a Higher Standard**

Our approach is simple; we put the client’s interests first, we do not stop until it is right, and we will do whatever it takes to get there.
As owners of CAI, we are committed to living our Foundational Principles, both professionally and personally:
We act with integrity.
We serve each other.
We serve society.
We work for our future.

With employee ownership, one person’s success is everyone’s success; we work diligently to accomplish team goals. We place Team Before Self, demonstrate Respect for Others, and possess a Can-Do Attitude (our core values). That is how we have grown exponentially.  

# Li - MD1
Gr 45 - MG2IN - Manager 2 - Scale INR (Min29,51,300 - Mid36,89,000-Max44,26,800)  

Other Benefits:
* 25 working days paid annual leave
* Paid sick leave as per Company/Labour Rules
* Medical Insurance for self and family
* Personal accident insurance coverage for self
* Annual discretionary bonus

  

# Li - MD1
We are an equal opportunity employer; we are proud to employ veterans and promote diversity and inclusion in our workplace. Diversity is a strength for our global company. We pledge that CAI will be operated in a way that is fair and equitable to all – our employees, our customers, and the broader society.

This job description is not all inclusive and you may be asked to do other duties. CAI will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Fair Chance Act (FCA) / Fair Chance Ordinance (FCO).  

# Li - MD1

description:
India
  
We are seeking a **Senior JavaScript Full Stack Developer** with AWS experience to join our remote team. As a member of the team, you will work on a project that requires excellent knowledge of TypeScript, Node.js, and Angular. The project includes the development of a web application that will be deployed on AWS. You will be responsible for the development and maintenance of the application, as well as for ensuring that it meets all the necessary requirements. Our team is distributed, which means that you will have the flexibility to work remotely.


responsibilities* Design and develop the web application using TypeScript, Node.js, and Angular
* Ensure that the application meets all the necessary requirements
* Collaborate with the team to identify and resolve technical problems
* Participate in code reviews and ensure that the code is of high quality
* Write automated tests using Mocha to ensure that the application is stable and reliable
* Deploy the application on AWS and ensure that it is scalable and performant
* Document the code and the architecture of the application
* Participate in sprint planning and estimation meetings
* Provide technical guidance to the team members

requirements* A minimum of 3 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer

nice to have* Experience with Java backend tasks

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
**Who are we:**  

Fulcrum Digital is an agile and next-generation digital accelerating company providing digital transformation and technology services right from ideation to implementation. These services have applicability across a variety of industries, including banking & financial services, insurance, retail, higher education, food, healthcare, and manufacturing.

 **The Role:**

  

* Plan, manage, and oversee all aspects of a Production Environment
* Define strategies for Application Performance Monitoring, Optimization in Prod environment.
* Respond to Incidents and improvise platform based on feedback and measure the reduction of incidents over time.
* Support deployment of code into multiple lower environments. Supporting current processes with an emphasis on automating everything as soon as possible.
* Design, develop and standardize Monitoring and Alerting mechanism for the supported applications.
* Take a holistic approach to problem solving, by connecting the dots during a production event through the various technology stack that makes up the platform, to optimize meantime to recover.
* Engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services—from inception and design, through deployment, operation, and refinement.
* Analyse ITSM activities of the platform and provide feedback loop to development teams on operational gaps or resiliency concerns.
* Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting, capacity planning and launch reviews.
* Support the application CI/CD pipeline for promoting software into higher environments through validation and operational gating, and lead in DevOps automation and best practices.
* Maintain services once they are live by measuring and monitoring availability, latency and overall system health.
* Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation and evolving systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.
* Work with a global team spread across tech hubs in multiple geographies and time zones.
* Ability to share knowledge and explain processes and procedures to others.
* Share knowledge and mentor junior resources.
* Able to perform on-call duties on a rotational basis.
* Occasional off hours work required.
* Candidate should have inclination for Training and should be good trainer and ready to mentor others.

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
India
  
As a remote **Senior Java Engineer**, you will live on the front lines of the products we create, and build features used by millions of people every day.  

  



We are seeking a Senior Java Engineer that will be responsible for developing customer's applications that interface with the database and front-end.The candidate should be very familiar with Oracle (customer's main database), Hibernate, transactions, and data modeling.The candidate will work directly with the customer’s team and will have a great chance to improve communication and planning skills.


responsibilities* Become an integral part of сustomer's IT team - participate in design, planning, requirements, development and delivery phase of product lifecycle
* Communicate with the сustomer’s business, analysts and QA teams. Reach out to the customer and clarify the questions, assist in issues resolution
* Take part in daily standup meetings and represent the development team

requirements* 4+ years of experience in Java development
